text:
shouldnâ€™t there be a `link` parameter? in there? also you need to name it
```{% linked_image 'the_instance_name' src='/file_manager/img/_assets/info/mockup-gastos-aeat.png', extra_classes='img-fluid w-100', wrapping_html='', link="#" overrideable=True, label='Name', open_in_new_tab=False %}```

the `/file_manager/` prefix is only meant to get file manager assets to render locally. in production, you'll need to use the `<https://cdn2>...` link instead. can't you just manually update that link before or after you upload?
Is it possible to add a dynamic class in hubL? for example I want to add the post tag as a class
`class="{% for tag in content.topic_list %}{{ tag.slug }} {% endfor %}"`
